# The `FPMathOperator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Utility class for floating point operations which can have information about relaxed accuracy requirements attached to them. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::FPMathOperator</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Utility class for floating point operations which can have information about relaxed accuracy requirements attached to them.

Definition at line 205 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operator-h">Operator.h</a>.

### getFPAccuracy() {#af50d863c0e5a39ec42b567a9ea58e351}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="float FPMathOperator::getFPAccuracy () const">
Get the maximum error permitted by this operation in ULPs.

An accuracy of 0.0 means that the operation should be performed with the default precision.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operator-h/#l00345">345</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/operator-h">Operator.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l02682">2682</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
